definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]

sentences.english: The artistic achievements of Xiuruji mostly embody two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 《繡襦記》的藝術成就主要體現在兩方面。

sentences.english: Ganymede tried to recollect that it was a man's duty to comfort and console a woman, the weaker vessel.
sentences.chinese: 蓋尼末德又拼命記起男人有責任安慰勸解女人。

sentences.english: Today, a move of the child, the simple mind, most of the food to eat.
sentences.chinese: 今天學了一招兒，簡單記一下，最該喫的食物。

sentences.english: If I can't think of an English word, I use a word or phrase that means the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 記生字時，在腦中想象一個這個字可以被運用的情境。

sentences.english: I will forget, until they no longer remember the past things.
sentences.chinese: 礻翴我會忘記，直到自己不再記起那些過去的事。

sentences.english: How can we set up an account with you?
sentences.chinese: 若何才能跟你們設立記帳戶頭呢？

sentences.english: This article brings a new kind of arithmetic for contour height automation annotation in contour map .
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的等高線高程自動註記算法。

sentences.english: God replied, Your angel's name is not hard to remember.
sentences.chinese: 上帝答道，“你的天使的名字並不難記。

sentences.english: In my public houses by lease documents, note that a mezzanine floor.
sentences.chinese: 在我的公房租賃憑證上，註記有個閣樓。

sentences.english: So head out and take note of the nearest supermarket, pharmacy, post office, library, etc.
sentences.chinese: 走出去，記下週圍的超市，藥店，郵局，圖書館等等。

sentences.english: After shouting Grandpa, he came back to God, remember grandpa has passed away.
sentences.chinese: 喊完爺爺之後，他回過神來，記起爺爺已經逝世了。

sentences.english: I cannot recall missing so many lay-ups during a game.
sentences.chinese: 例句我無法記起怎麼會投失了這麼多上籃。

sentences.english: I'd like to borrow a copy of Alice in Wonderland.
sentences.chinese: 我要借一本《愛麗絲漫遊奇境記》。

sentences.english: I'll try and remember, look it up for you next time.
sentences.chinese: 我會嘗試記起，下次查好。

definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
